Text: This zip has x86 and 64bit .deb and .rpm files in case anyone was wondering. It installs and works perfectly on Ubuntu 10.04 AMD64.
I have only image recorder available, how i will enable my dvd recorders???
Why would Nero be needed on Linux?  Just curious...

@Mkquist

As far as I know, Nero is one of the only (if not THE only) burning program for linux that supports Blu-Ray. So that's one reason.
